ygData.subject: Centaur info on Crafted Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I had a question about the crafted Armor, I know now that you can get it from the Centaur Village in South Karana, now the thing I ASK is: 1. What do I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I had a question about the crafted Armor, I know now that you can get it from the Centaur
Village in South Karana, now the thing I ASK is:

1. What do I have to do to GET the crafted items started, *btw the armors light blue*
2. Is this a warriors only quest, or can anyone do it
3. Where do I get the items to complete this Quest, details on where and what holds them, *mobs,
vendors, places etc.
4. What are the stats on the Crafted items, i.e Can us lovely SHAMANS wear it


All details can be sent to me, money is almost no option, but I don't want BS prices if you don't
know don't respond. I'm the Grand Master of my guild and I would like to start gathering verified
information, that i can pass onto my guildmates as *Fact*.

Thank you for your time

Thulgar
Grand Master of the Mystical Knights
htttp://www.efni.com/~thulgar
